talk_paragraph.talk_question: <html>{ui_string:1200001}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200002}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200003}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200004}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200005}</html>

$King Cassius$
I praise you for bringing back the Prophet. I was surprised to see that the Prophet... was just an ordinary country girl. I was disappointed, she didn't even bow to me and just kept on sleeping. I'm so disappointed....

$Duke Stuart$
The Prophet was only a girl who's been sleeping the entire time? Why did everyone make such a fuss over that child? We don't need a Prophet who can't even walk by herself.

$Court Sorceress Kayleen$
I heard that the girl whom they call, the Prophet, does nothing but sleep? Like a lazy bum...
I knew it! People were so excited that she was the Prophet, but in fact, she's useless!

$Bishop Ignacio$
I've heard. Why didn't you bring the Prophet... to me?
What? In Geraint's hands?
(Need to go the Secret Area in the Royal Palace to meet Geraint.)

$Argenta$
If you had listened to what Geraint was saying, you would know what to do!
Why are you asking me?

$Argenta$
Geraint....
You fool...!

$Geraint$
......I think that's all I need to say.
(His injury seems severe. He seems to be in pain.)

$Geraint$
.......
(Geraint has his eyes closed and is in deep thoughts.)

$Rose$
.......
(I don't hear anything. I can't reach anything.)

$Warrior Xian$
I'm dazed since so many unexpected things happened.
Wow....

$General Douglas$
Hmm... I heard that the Prophet we've rescued with such diffculty is just sleeping.
What seems to be the problem?

$General Douglas$
We did our best, so let the king decide what to do with the Prophet.
Anyway, great job.
(Need to go the Secret Area in the Royal Palace to meet Geraint.)

$Geraint$
Hurry and go to the Basement of the Saint Haven Royal Palace.
If you have this on your body, you'll be able to pass through.

$Geraint$
Proof of Pledge. As long as you have that on you, you can enter.
As long as my body doesn't disappear, that won't disappear.

$Argenta$
If you had listened to what Geraint was saying, you would know what to do!
Why are you asking me?

$King Cassius$
I praise you for bringing back the Prophet. I was surprised to see that the Prophet... was just an ordinary country girl. I was disappointed, she didn't even bow to me and just kept on sleeping. I'm so disappointed....

$Duke Stuart$
The Prophet is only a girl who's been sleeping the entire time? Why did everyone make such a fuss over that child?
We don't need a Prophet who can't even walk by herself.

$Court Sorceress Kayleen$
I heard that the girl whom they call, the Prophet, does nothing but sleep? Like a lazy bum...
I knew it! People were so excited that she was the Prophet, but in fact, she's useless!

$Bishop Ignacio$
I've heard. Why didn't you bring the Prophet... to me?
What? In Geraint's hands?
(Need to go the Secret Area in the Royal Palace to meet Geraint.)

$Rose$
.......
(I don't hear anything. I can't reach anything.)

$Warrior Xian$
I'm dazed since so many unexpected things happened.
Wow....
Oh, did you talk to Geraint?

$Argenta$
...He's doing something so unnecessary! Geraint, that fool.
(Argenta grumbles and stares at Geraint.)

$Geraint$
The Descendent of the Ancient lies in the center of my Nest.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>(Using that much power for the Prophet.)</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Geraint$
Yes, the center of a nest is a sanctuary. Except for the people whom the Nest's owner allows, no one can go in.
I thought this would be the best protection for the Descendent of the Ancient.

$Geraint$
Since I need to recover from my injuries, I'll be staying here for a while.
But, I believe Argenta is planning on leaving.

$Geraint$
In order to completely destroy a Nest, you'll have to defeat the owner.
Don't worry, since I can defeat anyone who weakens the Nest and tries to penetrate into it.

$Warrior Xian$
Hmm....
But, I wonder where Argenta is going?

$Argenta$
Geraint, that fool, he's doing something totally unnecessary.
He always finds a way to make his life difficult!

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Don't eat her! (Just give her to me.)</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Argenta$
That fool, he is injured, but he's staying here to protect that Descendent of the Ancient.
If he just eats her, he'll be able to cure his injuries easily.

$Argenta$
I'm not going to eat her. I would think it's better to eat her, but he decided to protect her. I have nothing more to say.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>The incident that happened 100 years... no, 50 years ago?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Argenta$
He always trusted anyone.
I never trust anyone except Geraint.
In the past, that trust ruined what we were doing.

$Argenta$
Yes, Geraint and I came to Saint Haven to defeat the Black Dragon Karas. I thought we would be enough, but Geraint didn't think so.
So he gathered some colleagues.

$Argenta$
Who cares if it's six or ten heroes? Besides those few, each brought hundreds of others.
Some were from the Sorceress group, Archer group and so on. So annoying.

$Argenta$
We almost had the Black Dragon defeated. We finally got to the Black Dragon's Jewel, and Geraint and I was going to destroy it. But then, Velskud stole it.

$Argenta$
Then, Velskud disappeared with the jewel. He joined us from the start to betray us.
We barely defeated the Black Dragon. Geraint and I sustained injuries, so we had to hide for a while.

$Argenta$
Well... I don't want to take part in this guardian thing.
Nor there is anything more I can do here.

$Argenta$
I'm going to see Karacule.
I have to find out if there is a way to cure Geraint faster.

$Argenta$
Anyway, I'm going to the Lotus Marsh. Annoying kid, have fun with the other kids or not.
Goodbye.
(Argenta leaves without even looking back.)

$Argenta$
Anyway, I'm going to the Lotus Marsh. Annoying kid, have fun with the other kids or not.
Goodbye.
(Argenta leaves without even looking back.)

$Warrior Xian$
Geraint was the Gold Dragon.... So many amazing things happened, I can't clear my mind. I think Edan and Angelica all feel the same. Triana.... hmm, I don't know much about an Elf's feelings.

$Warrior Xian$
But {user_nick}, you are so calm. I'm amazed.
Frankly, I almost fainted.
Suddenly, there was the Gold Dragon in front of me!!! Ahh!

$Warrior Xian${action:Talk}
Oh! I think I heard you say that.... Then...
(Xian comes closer.)
{user_nick} knows the future for everyone? What about mine? Do you know?

$Warrior Xian$
That's a shame. (Xian seems disappointed)
...But, 50 years ago, Barnac and the other heroes defeated the Black Dragon Karas!

$Warrior Xian$
Then, what's this Black Dragon? I heard Argenta's story, so I know the Black Knight stole the Black Dragon's Jewel and ran away.

$Warrior Xian$
What~?! So... the Black Knight used the power Rose possessed as the Descendent of the Ancient, and became a full Black Dragon? Oh.... he had the Black Dragon's Jewel, but since he was a human, he needed to borrow the Ancient's Power...!!

$Warrior Xian$
Oh.... As you can see, Rose is an ordinary weak girl. He's so evil to kidnap that girl and make her so exhusted! But, why did the Black Knight change like that?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>It's not that, I was just trying to rescue the Prophet...</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Warrior Xian$
Aww! Why are you screaming?
Didn't you, {user_nick} went to battle to fight him?

$Warrior Xian$
Yes~ to rescue Rose, the Prophet!! We have the same objective! (Xian smiles)
Hehe. We're all on the righteous side.
<html>$Quest Reward$</html>

journal.title: Settled for the Time Being I
journal.contents:
Injured Geraint says he will take the Prophet. Go to the place he mentioned.

Saint Haven Royal Palace(Secret Basement Area) → Geraint
journal.destination: Talk to Geraint at the Basement of the Saint Haven Royal Palace
journal.todo_msg: Go to the Basement of the Saint Haven Royal Palace.

journal.title: Settled for the Time Being II
journal.contents:
To protect the Prophet, Geraint made Saint Haven his Nest. Now, it seems Argenta is preparing to go somewhere else, so talk to her.

Saint Haven Royal Palace(Secret Basement Area) → Argenta
journal.todo_msg: Say goodbye to Argenta who is about to leave.

journal.title: Settled for the Time Being III
journal.contents:
Argenta left. Talk to Warrior Xian.

Saint Haven Royal Palace(Secret Basement Area) → Warrior Xian
